## NativeQuery.setParameter() method

设置查询参数值，占位符支持下标和字符串

**Signature:**

```typescript
setParameter(index: number | string, value: unknown): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number \| string | 占位符 |
|  value | unknown | 参数值 |

**Returns:**

void
